name: Slendy
description:
You get lost with your car. Surrounded by forest you see something in the distance. You decide to take a look but once there you wander off the road and find what you might think are... pieces of paper that say "don't look at it" 

This forest is far from what you can expect

Minimum recommended configuration:

CPU: i5-6600

GPU: RTX 2070

RAM: 8GB

HARD DISK SPACE: 469MB

Recommended configuration:

CPU: i5-9400

GPU: RTX 2080TI - 3070

RAM: 8GB

HARD DISK SPACE: 469M
